channel.title: Wud i need a webclient?
channel.description: if i got my own webclient and stuff wud it be a dedicated server or? and wuts the best website to make it on will i need a domain name? :o

item.title: Wud i need a webclient?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

il just wait till im 17-18 then get dedi hopefully be still working with private servers only 15 now

Read full topic

item.title: Wud i need a webclient?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:11, topic:248455”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=327515.msg2564384#msg2564384 date=1228334162]

You don’t need a WebClient. And a dedicated server is a dedicated host which can Hold alot more people than your average person, and you also have to pay for a Dedicated server.

Yea, I’m with the VNC tight connection dedicated hosting. 50$ a month, 300+ people no lag ftw
[/quote]

lol yh i seen that i clicked on it too its a shame that i havent got a bank =[[/quote]
My friend Joe and me buy it with donations from the server players.
It’s not 40$, but his friend owns it so He has a little hookup
And he pays with a Debit card I believe

Read full topic

i havent got a bank and my parents wudent tell me there bank details lol so looks like not dedicated server for me =[=[=[=[

yep gna have to nick urs =]
